gw.api.print

Class CustomPrintAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.print.PrintAction
      • gw.api.print.AbstractCCPrintAction
        • gw.api.print.CustomPrintAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.web.print.process.PrintGenerator, com.guidewire.pl.web.print.process.XslGenerator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractOrganizationTreeViewPrintAction

    public abstract class CustomPrintAction
extends AbstractCCPrintAction
    Print action which allows PDF generation outside of the widget print framework. This is used for printing customized views of data where widget traversal is impractical or impossible. This is not the prefered way to generate print output.
    Author:
    pyoung

      • printContent

        protected void printContent(com.guidewire.pl.web.print.context.PdfPrintContext context)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Generates all PDF content. Override this if you need to do something very specific but otherwise the preferred way is to override generateBody().
